item.title: Conservative author calls Kamala Harris 'original hawk tuah girl', faces backlash

item.title: US, Canada fighter jets intercept Russia, China planes near Alaska hours ahead of Biden's speech

item.title: 'Radical left lunatic ...': Donald Trump targets Kamala Harris at first rally since Biden's exit from 2024 race
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: A day before Trump's assassination bid, shooter searched online about John F Kennedy's shooting
item.description: FBI disclosed that Thomas Matthew Crooks, responsible for shooting at Trump in Pennsylvania, had researched JFK's assassination. Crooks was killed by a Secret Service sniper. Two attendees were injured, and a firefighter was killed.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Prince Harry opens up on what caused his distance from royal family: 'Made it clear'
item.description: ​Prince Harry said his decision to continue the fight against the media intrusion in the royal family has been the "central piece" behind the rift between him and the rest of the family members in the Palace. He opened up for the first time since the four-year legal battle concluded and said he had been vindicated. The comments are to be aired as part of an ITV documentary on Thursday.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Elon Musk sits in Netanyahu's private box while Congress members boycott
item.description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk didn't only make a surprise appearance at the US Capitol when Israel PM Benjamin Netanyahu addressed the Congress but say in the PM's private box in the visitors' gallery above the House floor, alongside Netanyahu's wife Sara. He was there at the event as Netanyahu's guest -- while more than 30 members of the Congress boycotted the address amid widespread protest against Netanyahu.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Brutal! Video of man's face kicked, head stamped by cop in Manchester Airport
item.description: ​A shocking video of a man being kicked and his head stamped by a police officer at Manchester Airport has emerged on social media sending shockwaves. Greater Manchester Police said the officers were attacked while attempting to arrest someone but they are looking into the video and the conduct shown in the video. Police said there was a fight at the airport's Terminal 2 following which the officers -- caught in the video -- were pressed into action.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Maggots at Netanyahu's table? Anti-Israel protesters' claim with questionable video
item.description: Amid ongoing anti-Israel protests ahead of Netanyahu's address to the later today, a pro-Palestine organization claimed to have unleashed maggots at Washington DC's Watergate hotel where some of the Israeli delegates were staying. A video of the critters spread out across what seemed like a dinner table went viral but it is not yet known whether it was a staged video or protesters actually breached the security of the hotel. Israeli and American flags could be seen in the background.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 10 things about openly gay Pete Buttigieg, who could be Kamala Harris' running mate
item.description: 42-year-old Pete Buttigieg is one of the frontrunners in the race to become Kamala Harris' running mate though according to experts, if he is chosen, it will be too many 'firsts' in the November election. First African-Asian origin woman contesting in the presidential election with a first openly gay minister of the cabinet running as the VP candidate.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'Laffin Kamala' lights up Gen Z and social media
item.dc:creator: Chidanand Rajghatta

item.title: FBI director testifies on Trump shooting: 'Motive still unknown, working tirelessly'
item.description: A day after Secret Service director Kimberly Cheatle resigned facing the heat over the Donald Trump assassination bid, FBI director Christopher Wray told the Congress Wednesday that FBI will leave no stone unturned in its investigation of the attempted assassination of former President Donald Trump. He said the motive of Thomas Mathhew Crooks firing at Donald Trump at the Pennsylvania rally is not yet revealed.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Pete Buttigieg slams JD Vance's 'childless cat lady' jibe: 'You shouldn't be...'
item.description: Buttigieg is the first openly gay Cabinet member married to Chasten Buttigieg, a teacher, author and an activist. They have two adopted children. “The really sad thing is, he said that after Chasten [Buttigieg] and I had been through a fairly heartbreaking setback in our adoption journey,” he said on the CNN.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'More Ukrainians willing to cede territory to Russia for peace'
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: China squeezes Taiwan by targeting islands and fishing sites
item.description: Taiwanese fishermen report a significant change in their traditional fishing practices near Chinese waters due to increased patrols by the Chinese Coast Guard. This shift follows the detention of a Taiwanese fishing boat and its crew by Beijing for the first time in 17 years for violating a fishing ban. This situation indicates China's new tactics to exert pressure on Taiwan

item.title: Watch: Escalator fire at New York's JFK Airport prompts temporary evacuation
item.description: On Wednesday morning, a fire broke out on an escalator at John F. Kennedy International Airport's Terminal 8 in New York, resulting in a brief evacuation of the area. Fire department officials in New York stated that the fire was reported at approximately 7 am. Fortunately, no one was injured during the incident.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'Doug Emhoff is gonna make Melania Trump look like...': Video of Kamala Harris' husband viral
item.description: A video of Kamala Harris' husband Douglas Emhoff is doing the rounds where he is fervently speaking about his wife, the vice president and former president Donald Trump's attack on her. The video is drawing comparisons between the spouses of the probable presidential candidates -- considering Kamala Harris will be the Democratic candidate against Donald Trump.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'I was called a witch': Hillary Clinton's advice for 'chronically underestimated' Kamala Harris
item.description: Hillary Clinton extended support to vice president Kamala Harris as the Democratic presidential candidate and said she will have an uphill battle as the first Black and South Asian woman to be at the top of a major party’s ticket. In an opinion piece on New York Times, Hillary Clinton commended President Joe Biden's decision and said Kamala Harris can defeat Donald Trump.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'Most beautiful biker' Tatyana Ozolina dies in motorbike accident
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: In fuel-guzzling Saudi Arabia, electric cars pique interest
item.description: For Hamed al-Rafidain, a Saudi human resources worker, an electric vehicle offers welcome savings, especially since his other car is a fuel-guzzling four-wheeler favoured by motorists in the desert kingdom. "What drove me to buy an electric vehicle was financial considerations," said Rafidain, who spends up to 2,000 riyals ($530) a month on fuel for his off-road vehicle.

item.title: 'Jimmy Carter passed away' turns out to be social 'experiment': Fake news alert
item.dc:creator: TOI News Desk
